label.value: assay measuring T cell epitope specific in vivo activity

definition.value: A T cell epitope dependent biological activity determination assay that uses an in vivo intervention experiment.

label.value: epitope tolerance induction experiment

definition.value: An efficacy of epitope intervention experiment that tests the ability of the intervention to decrease an existing immune response

label.value: mass spectrometry assay measuring MHC ligand processing and presentation of MHC ligands eluted from cellular MHC

definition.value: A mass spectrometry of MHC ligands assay that identifies eluted ligands from cell bound MHC.

label.value: cytometric bead array measuring epitope specific granulocyte macrophage colony-stimulating factor production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects granulocyte macrophage colony stimulating factor production by T cells.

label.value: binding assay using radioactivity detection

definition.value: A binding assay that uses radioactivity detection as an indicator of binding.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring T cell epitope specific protection based on survival

definition.value: An in vivo assay measuring T cell epitope specific protection from other challenge using survival.

label.value: cell bound MHC competitive binding assay of a MHC:ligand complex using T cell epitope recognition

definition.value: A cell bound MHC binding assay that uses a T cell epitope recognition assay.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring epitope specific T cell helper activity

definition.value: A T cell epitope dependent biological activity assay that detects the ability of epitope specific helper T cells to enhance either B cell or T cell adaptive immune response function.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-22 production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects interleukin-22 production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific perforin release by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytotoxic T cell degranulation assay that detects perforin release by T cells.

label.value: binding assay using fluorescence detection

definition.value: A binding assay that uses fluorescence detection as an indicator of binding.

label.value: coelution assay measuring MHC ligand processing and presentation using T cell recognition of HPLC fractionated eluate compared to synthetic ligand

definition.value: A MHC ligand processing and presentation assay in which an HPL chromatography is run to separate an input mixture of ligands eluted from MHC into fractions. These fractions are tested for recognition by T cells and compared to the recognition of a synthetic ligand that is presumed to be the recognized epitope. Identical HPLC fractionation and T cell recognition patterns confirm that the specific ligand was presented by MHC molecules.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay

definition.value: An assay in which a material's fluorescence is determined.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring T cell epitope specific treatment of disease

definition.value: An efficacy of T cell epitope intervention experiment that detects a decrease in disease.

label.value: Edman degradation assay measuring MHC ligand processing and presentation

definition.value: A MHC ligand processing and presentation assay that uses Edman degradation to identify the eluted ligands

label.value: mass spectrometry assay measuring MHC ligand processing and presentation of MHC ligands eluted from secreted MHC

definition.value: A mass spectrometry of MHC ligands that identifies eluted ligands from secreted MHC.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17A production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects interleukin-17A production by T cells.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that detects loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring half maximal effective concentration [EC50] to determine direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures half maximal effective concentration (EC50) to detect the direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring half maximal inhibitory concentration [IC50] to determine competitive binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to cell-bound-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that detects direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring half maximal inhibitory concentration [IC50] to determine competitive binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to cell-bound-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: ELISA measuring epitope specific granulocyte colony stimulating factor production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay that detects granulocyte colony stimulating factor production by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17F production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects interleukin-17F production by T cells.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring equilibrium association constant [KA] to determine direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures equilibrium association constant (KA) to detect the direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring half life to determine direct binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures half life to detect the direct binding of a purified-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-9 production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects interleukin-9 production by T cells.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that detects loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to cell-bound-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring binding on rate [kon] to determine direct binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay measuring binding on rate (kon) to detect direct binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-13 production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects interleukin-13 production by T cells.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine direct binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex approximated by EC50

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect direct binding of a purified-MHC molecule with a ligand and provides EC50 values determined under assay conditions where the EC50 approximates a KD value.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a cell-lysate-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to cell-lysate-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific macrophage inflammatory protein-1 alpha production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects macrophage inflammatory protein-1 alpha production by T cells.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to cell-bound-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: assay measuring binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A qualitative binding assay that detects the binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific tumor necrosis factor (ligand) superfamily member 11 production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects tumor necrosis factor (ligand) superfamily member 11 production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring a binding constant of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC:ligand binding assay that measures a binding constant.

label.value: assay measuring binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A qualitative binding assay that detects the binding of a purified-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that detects direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring half life to determine direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures half life to detect the direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring half life to determine direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures half life to detect the direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring half maximal effective concentration [EC50] to determine direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures half maximal effective concentration (EC50) to detect direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17F production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects interleukin-17F production by T cells.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex approximated by IC50

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation and provides IC50 values determined under assay conditions where the IC50 approximates a KD value.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring half life to determine direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures half life to detect the direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring binding off rate [koff] to determine direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures binding off rate [koff] to detect direct binding of a cell-lysate-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring half maximal inhibitory concentration [IC50] to determine competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring binding off rate [koff] to determine direct binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures binding off rate [koff] to detect direct binding of a purified-MHC molecule with a ligand.
